top_comments.comment: Investing in crypto now should be in every wise individuals list, in some months time you'll be ecstatic with the decision you made today.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Mindset of company's has to be changed.. they should come out of owner n slave mindset...

I miss working, I get by with  Social security, I miss interacting with co-workers, and looking forward to a pay check. Now I am nearly 70 years old. And no one wants to hire old broken people.

People are waking up en masse...finally!
Our HOPE is in GOD, our HOPE is in JESUS, only JESUS can give us real JOY, real PEACE🙌🙏😇❤️
